Frequently Asked Questions

When is Farmhouse Fest?

Saturday, June 27th 2015. 12pm - 6pm.

How much are tickets?

Tickets are $50 plus taxes. You can buy them here.

What do I get for $50 plus tax?

  • Entry
  • A stylish tasting glass
  • 4 tokens (4oz pour per token)

How much are additional tokens?

$10 will get you 6 tokens, good for a 4oz pour each. There will be no '2 or more tokens for exclusive pours' nonsense, every beer we pour will cost a single token.

Where is the Farmhouse Fest being held?

At the UBC Farm - 3461 Ross Drive, Vancouver

What bus do I take to get there?

Get to the UBC Loop however you can (99 B-Line, 25, 33, 41, 49, etc), then take shuttle C20, which runs every 30 minutes and will drop you off at the gates of the UBC Farm. Or get off at UBC Loop Bay 8; walk 0.61 kms south on West 16th, turn left at the first street East Mall; right onto Ross Drive.

Is there parking?

Limited parking is available at the UBC Farm but, seeing as this is a beer festival, we would really prefer that you take public transit.

Can I bring my kids? Dogs?

Sorry, no. This is a licensed 19+ event and Fido isn’t permitted on the farm.

Will you be serving food?

Yes, there will be food options at the festival. No outside food or beverages will be permitted on site, with the exception of sealed or empty water bottles. More info and specific vendors will be added when we know more.

Who's running this thing?

Your friendly neighbourhood organizing crew consists of @jonnybeers, @mezzoblue, @hopscanary, @kump, @barley_mowat and @foodandbier.

You Should Come To This Festival

With a beautiful venue, great breweries, and limited attendance, you don't want to miss the festival everyone will be talking about this summer.

Buy Tickets

It's at a Cool Place

UBC Farm is a gorgeous outdoor venue, with enough room to celebrate great beer without feeling crowded. It’s even easily accessible by transit.

Where's the UBC Farm?

Featuring Unique & Limited Brews by Some of the Best Breweries
